name: Magical Girl Mary VS E.V.I.L.
overview: Magical Girl Mary Vs E.V.I.L., Use a Joystick in Port 2 to move Mary and Fire Button to Shoot, This is a Push Scroll Game so moving forward will scroll the screen and you can only fire forward, Also 1 Player Only Game, Have Fun. Made with help from the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Using my modified SEUCK Enhancement Framework Code, Original Framework code by Richard Bayliss of TND, Music by Andrew Fisher
